ru.dz.ccu825.transport

Class CCU825_ReadWriteMultipleRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.msg.ModbusMessageImpl
      • com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.msg.ModbusRequest
        • ru.dz.ccu825.transport.CCU825_ReadWriteMultipleRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.io.Transportable, com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.msg.ModbusMessage

    public final class CCU825_ReadWriteMultipleRequest
extends com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.msg.ModbusRequest
    Modified j2mod class used to support CCU825 modbus connector.

    Class implementing a Read / Write Multiple Registers request. Special edition for CCU825 style packet I/O over ModBus.

    Author:
    dz
